data.name: 365PDX
data.description:
An online conference about Microsoft’s Modern Workplace tools: Office 365, Azure, Power Platform, Teams, Power BI, Dynamics 365 and related Microsoft technologies from the Portland and Pacific NW IT community


Thursday & Friday, August 20th & 21st, 2020
